name: Absolute Wall
definition: Summon forth the Great Wall of Hololive. Has a small chance to protect from projectiles.

name: BL Fujoshi
definition: Endless BL, how shameless!

name: Black Plague
definition: A historically deadly disease that continuously spreads to any targets nearby. Has a very small chance to defeat a target instantly.

name: Blood Lust
definition: Two powerful murderous forces combine.

name: Bone Bros.
definition: Don't bite the hand that feeds you if it's holding a knife.

name: Breathe-In Type Asacoco
definition: Limited time only for 5000 yen!!!

name: Broken Dreams
definition: The dream is dead and there is no hope. Bubble Shield also slows targets.

name: Crescent Bardiche
definition: A large bardiche that deals high critical damage, and summons falling stars.

name: Curse Ball
definition: Play ball! The more you play, the longer it stays.

name: Dragon Fire
definition: The power of a once LEGENDARY Dragon. The OG.

name: Eldritch Horror
definition: Summons unknown horrors. May Life-steal up to 5% HP from targets defeated in whirlpool.

name: Elite Cooking
definition: May have severe unknown side effects if consumed.

name: Flattening Board
definition: Feel the wrath of cutting boards...!?

name: Frozen Sea
definition: Endless waves of ice that slows targets.

name: I'm Die, Thank You Forever
definition: Throw a Bomb that attaches to a target. When target is defeated, the bomb explodes.

name: Idol Concert
definition: Throw glowstick in all directions that explode into song!

name: Legendary Sausage
definition: A continuously spinning sausage. Spins faster as you move.

name: Light Beam
definition: Throw glowsticks that explode into targeted beams!

name: Lightning Wiener
definition: Shoots Lightning charged weiners that home into targets, and summons lightning to strike down when hit.

name: MiComet
definition: Real business partners.

name: MiKorone
definition: Burning hot potatos fall, and targets hit by it leave lava pools as they move.

name: Rap Dog
definition: Drop some HOT BEATS where targets hit take 20% more damage.

name: Ring Of Fitness
definition: Continuously throw a ring of fitness balls. Hope nobody walks in.

name: Snow Flower Sake
definition: Throw a bottle that shatters into a Snowflake. Has a 30% chance to cause Frozen.

name: Stream Of Tears
definition: Nothing can stop the stream of tears.
